response.overview: Abbas I (Wahid Ezzat) accuses his younger brother Abbas III (Saeed Abdel Ghani) of being insane by the prosecution to the health inspector Dr. Hakim (Mohamed Awad) to reveal him and write a report on his condition,  Abbas informed him that his brother had tried to slaughter his wife No Nu, did not deny Abbas III, and decided to Dr. Hakim put Abbas III under observation for two months in the hospital crazy,
response.title: المهزله
